methods.name: Run
methods.logic: This method executes the Wasm lowering phase. It takes a PipelineData object, which likely holds the intermediate representation of the code being compiled, and a Zone object, which is probably a memory allocation arena for temporary data.

constants.name: DECL_TURBOSHAFT_PHASE_CONSTANTS(WasmLowering)
constants.logic: This macro declares constants related to the WasmLowering phase.  These constants are likely used internally by the Turboshaft compiler infrastructure for managing and identifying the phase.
